plot: Jennifer is an American living in Paris and she loves two things: Vincent, a younger French man, and nice shoes. They spend a final day together and Jennifer has one last chance to finally get what she wants.
title: Les palais des chaussures
plot_es: Jennifer is an American living in Paris and she loves two things: Vincent, a younger French man, and nice shoes. They spend a final day together and Jennifer has one last chance to finally get what she wants.
plot_en: Jennifer is an American living in Paris and she loves two things: Vincent, a younger French man, and nice shoes. They spend a final day together and Jennifer has one last chance to finally get what she wants.
